items.question: How accurate is the AI for Uzbek legal documents?
items.answer: Our AI has been specifically trained on Uzbekistan's legal corpus with over 95% accuracy. It continuously improves through machine learning and expert feedback.

items.question: Is my data secure with Legal Nexus AI?
items.answer: Yes, all your data is stored in Uzbekistan-based data centers with enterprise-grade encryption. We never share your documents with third parties.

items.question: Do I need legal expertise to use the platform?
items.answer: No, the platform is designed to be user-friendly for both legal professionals and non-specialists. The AI provides explanations in plain language.

items.question: Can I use Legal Nexus AI on mobile devices?
items.answer: Yes, our platform is fully responsive and works on all modern devices including smartphones and tablets.

items.question: Which languages are supported?
items.answer: Legal Nexus AI fully supports Uzbek, Russian, and English, with accurate translations and analysis in all three languages.

items.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
items.answer: You can cancel your subscription anytime through your account settings. There are no long-term commitments or cancellation fees.
